item.description:
Support 9/11 truth activism in RI

Distribute Oathkeeper DVD'S - July 4th - Bristol Rhode Island

Distribute Oathkeeper DVD'S at the July 4th event in Bristol Rhode Island.

Meet at Honey Dew Dognuts 191 Washington Street Hudson @ 9:30 am before departing to Bristol RI.

A planning meetup will be scheduled for Saturday, June 27th @ noon for all that want to go.

Contact Laurie at harleyfires@aol.com

group.name: We Are Change Boston / Boston 9/11 Truth

item.name: Distribute Oathkeeper DVD'S - July 4th - Bristol Rhode Island
